title.rendered: 3PL and Accentuate form a winning partnership

content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_custom_heading text=”Hilarious “guess the accent” game goes global: 3PL and Accentuate form a winning partnership” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text]3PL, one of the UK’s leading providers of multichannel eCommerce fulfilment and logistics services, is getting on board with the creators of the multi-award-winning Accentuate Games Ltd as their global third-party fulfilment & logistics partner. 3PL will support Accentuate Games as they continue their incredible growth, expand into new territories and bring joy and excitement to new customers.

Since braving the Dragons Den in 2015 and winning investment from Peter Jones, the original hilarious-guess-the-accent game; Accentuate, has gone on to be hugely popular with players around the world, enthralling enthusiasts in the UK, US and Canadian markets.

“With other clientele of Dragons Den fame already onboard with 3PL we were delighted to offer operational support to Graeme and Fiona and to be associated with the Accentuate Games brand ”. said John Scully, Business Development, 3PL “Our flexible pay per use fulfilment & logistics services are a proven path to growing sales and reaching a much wider audience without the need for our customers to invest in huge infrastructure. I’m pretty sure this won’t be the last Dragons Den entrepreneur that comes through our doors!”

“The proven capability of 3PL to deliver a seamless and automatic fulfilment system from customer order to game delivery for all of our games enabled an essential revolution in our business operation” said Dr Graeme Fraser-Bell, Chief Executive of Accentuate Games Ltd “by leveraging 3PL’s proprietary Fusion software, we can now see all our key metrics, real-time, any time”.

As the demand for online shopping increases year on year, so does the need for brands to keep abreast of ever-changing consumer habits. That is why it has become so important for brands to find a fulfilment partner that can enable them to streamline operations and deliver a better customer experience by integrating their orders seamlessly across multiple channels. Accentuate now have the flexibility to scale quickly as demand continues to grow.

Shop the latest accentuate games at www.accentuategames.com

About 3PL

Based in Wigan, 3PL provides multichannel ecommerce fulfilment & logistics to fast growing brands. As an end-to-end fulfilment solution, 3PL operates from over 250,000 sq. ft of shared user warehousing in the UK, supported by access to a network of International warehouses to support International expansion for its clients. Its fast-moving operations house over 16 million units of stock, across 32,000 product lines.

About Accentuate

Accentuate Games Ltd are the creators of multi award-winning board games, Accentuate®, FReNeTiC® and Rats to Riches™, developed by Wirral based brother-sister team Dr Graeme and Fiona Fraser-Bell and launched in 2014. Accentuate games are now enjoyed by players across the world and are listed by major retailers including Amazon, Argos, John Lewis and Harrods.
